directions: Quarter lettuce heads lengthwise, keeping stem ends attached. Carefully wash in cold water, then dry in a salad spinner.
Whisk together vinegar, shallot, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper, then add oils in a slow stream, whisking until combined.
Spoon vinaigrette over lettuce wedges, then scatter with nuts and cheese.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons Zinfandel vinegar or other good-quality red-wine vinegar (preferably "O" brand)
1/4 pound Stilton, crumbled or shaved (with a cheese plane)
title: Boston Lettuce Wedges with Zinfandel Vinaigrette and Stilton
